channel.title: Aditee Prabhutendolkar on The California Tech

item.title: Interview with Hima Vatti About the Caltech Title IX Program
item.description: How long have you worked in the Equity and Title IX office? I became Caltechâ€™s Title IX Coordinator and started managing the Equity and Title IX Office in July 2019. We address issues of sexual misconduct, relationship violence, and stalking, as well as unlawful discrimination and harassment based on legally protected characteristics, including sex, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, race, national origin, ethnicity, medical conditions, disabilities, and religion.
